title: Schema for payload wrapper in data-transfer-project generic endpoints

payload.description: The inner payload, which contains data from one of the described data verticals

schemaSource.description: The source file containing the schema definition.  The whole path relative to this package is not needed, so the value may be '.../SocialPostsSerializer.java' rather than './src/main/java/org/datatransferproject/datatransfer/generic/SocialPostsSerializer'.
